rooms.description: Open-plan living area combined with the kitchen, designed in Scandinavian style with minimalistic decor and natural light.
Open-plan integrated kitchen area that complements the living room; features energy-efficient appliances and a neutral color palette with Scandinavian design influences.
Dedicated home office space located adjacent to the living area; designed for productivity with ample natural light and minimalist decor in line with Scandinavian aesthetics.
Spacious bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation; incorporates Vastu principles by orienting the bed towards the north-east corner and includes built-in storage solutions.
Private bathroom integrated into the bedroom area; designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu-compliant water element placement.
